history.proof: intros A p H m. induction p using prechain_ind. - hauto use: chain_concat_s unfold: prechain_last, pre_domok_incr_chain_def inv: prechain_incr, prechain_dom_ok. - qsimpl use: domok_single,domok_concat. qsimpl use: domok_single,domok_concat. qsimpl use: domok_single,domok_concat. qauto use: chain_concat_m, pre_domok_incr_chain_0 unfold: prechain_last, pre_domok_incr_chain_def inv: prechain_incr, prechain_dom_ok.
